name: Eclipse X1
details: Over-ear headphones offering a balanced sound with a sleek design. Features 40mm dynamic drivers, a frequency response of 20Hz-20kHz, and a lightweight, foldable design for portability.

name: Thunderbolt
details: Over-ear headphones with powerful bass and enhanced noise isolation. Equipped with 50mm drivers, 32Ω impedance, and passive noise reduction technology for immersive listening.

name: Mirage Pro
details: Premium over-ear headphones designed for audiophiles. Features 45mm neodymium drivers, 10Hz-25kHz frequency response, and memory foam ear cushions for extended comfort.

name: Vortex
details: Top-tier over-ear headphones with professional-grade sound quality. Includes 50mm high-definition drivers, 16Ω impedance, active noise-canceling technology, and a built-in microphone for calls.

name: Fusion
details: Over-ear headphones focused on clarity and comfort. Features 40mm drivers, a frequency response of 18Hz-22kHz, and a durable, tangle-free cable with in-line controls.

name: Reverb
details: High-performance over-ear headphones with advanced noise-canceling technology. Includes 50mm drivers, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, up to 30 hours of battery life, and quick charge capabilities.

name: Zen Buds
details: In-ear headphones with a comfortable fit and clear, dynamic sound. Features 10mm drivers, 16Hz-20kHz frequency response, and multiple ear tip sizes for a customized fit.

name: Pulse
details: In-ear headphones designed for active lifestyles. Equipped with 9mm drivers, a 20Hz-18kHz frequency response, sweat resistance, and an ergonomic design for secure wear during workouts.

name: Echo
details: Premium in-ear headphones with superior sound isolation. Features balanced armature drivers, a 15Hz-22kHz frequency response, and a lightweight aluminum housing for durability.

name: Infinity
details: High-end in-ear headphones with an expansive soundstage. Includes dual dynamic drivers, a 10Hz-25kHz frequency response, and a tangle-free cable with in-line microphone and remote.

name: Surge
details: In-ear headphones offering an immersive sound experience. Equipped with 11mm drivers, a 12Hz-24kHz frequency response, IPX5 water resistance, and noise-isolating ear tips.

name: Rhythm
details: Premium in-ear headphones designed for clear, balanced audio. Features triple balanced armature drivers, a 10Hz-20kHz frequency response, and a durable Kevlar-reinforced cable.

name: Aether Pods
details: Affordable earbuds with a lightweight design and balanced sound. Includes 8mm drivers, a 20Hz-20kHz frequency response, and a compact charging case for portability.

name: Velocity
details: Earbuds offering high-fidelity sound and a secure fit. Features 10mm drivers, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, 6-hour battery life, and noise-canceling microphones for clear calls.

name: Nimbus
details: Premium earbuds with noise-canceling features. Equipped with 12mm drivers, a 20Hz-22kHz frequency response, active noise cancellation, and a wireless charging case.

name: Sonic Wave
details: Top-of-the-line earbuds with immersive sound quality. Includes 14mm drivers, a 15Hz-24kHz frequency response, touch controls, and IPX7 waterproof rating.

name: Astra
details: Earbuds designed for rich, detailed sound. Features hybrid drivers, a 10Hz-25kHz frequency response, adaptive noise cancellation, and a premium metal finish.

name: Quasar
details: High-end earbuds offering superior sound clarity. Includes planar magnetic drivers, a 5Hz-28kHz frequency response, customizable EQ settings, and a magnetic charging dock.
